required.name: Albania
required.note: Visa not required for a max. stay of 90 days for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by the USA, UK or Schengen.

required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
required.note: Visa not required for a max. stay of 7 days for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by UK, Ireland or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Canada
required.note: eTA required if arriving by air from March 15, 2016 for US permanent resident card holders.

required.name: El Salvador
required.note: Visa not required for Holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Guatemala
required.note: Visa not required for a max. stay of 90 days for holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member.

required.name: Honduras
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by Canada, USA or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Republic of Macedonia
required.note: Visa not required for a max. stay of 15 days for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by Canada, US or UK

required.name: Mexico
required.note: Visa not required for a max. stay of 180 days for holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, Japan, USA, UK or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Serbia
required.note: Visa not required for holders of Schengen, US or UK visa or residence permits (max stay 90 days)

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: A 96-hour transit visa can be obtained on arrival at Dubai (DXB), provided transit time is at least 8 hours; and holding onward ticket to a third country; and holding a passport valid for at least 6 months from date of arrival. Visa fee of 170 AED. Visas are only issued as a part of a transit package together with hotel accommodation and airport transfer

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc without a visa for up to 30 days.

not-required.name: Antigua and Barbuda
not-required.note: 180 days. Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely. Freedom of Movement all citizens from OECS states.

not-required.name: Austria
not-required.note: 90 days in any 180-days in Schengen Area

not-required.name: Barbados
not-required.note: 180 days. Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

not-required.name: Belgium
not-required.note: 90 days in any 180-days in Schengen Area

not-required.name: Belize
not-required.note: 180 days. Holders of Caricom Certificate of Skills can stay indefinitely.

not-required.name: China
not-required.note:
30 days
 Hong Kong visa-free 90 days
 Macao visa-free 90 days

not-required.note: 90 days in any 180-days in Schengen Area

not-required.note: 90 days in any 180-days in Schengen Area

not-required.name: Dominica

not-required.name: France
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days inside Schengen Area; also visa-free access to Guadeloupe, Martinique, French Guiana, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Réunion, Mayotte and Wallis and Futuna.

not-required.note: 90 days as tourists or 30 days for business

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

on-arrival.name: Armenia
on-arrival.note: 120 days. Obtainable on arrival at Zvartnots International Airport or prior to travel online.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: Conditions apply. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Laos

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note: 30 days, must hold an invitation letter issued at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.
